amendment.description: Amendment requires certification by a system operator that both water and energy conservation are components of their fiscal sustainability plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-36 to require certification by a system operator that both water and energy conservation are components of their fiscal sustainability plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dahlkemper amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Dahlkemper.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dahlkemper amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
